description: Even enemies become friends; no one wishes me harm. This bhava reflects transformation through divine love and inner purity.

description: When I am pleasing to You, Divine, all my tasks are taken care of. This bhava is about divine grace and effortless success.

name: no fear of death bhava

name: always at peace bhava
description: An ongoing state of calmness and inner silence, no matter the outer situations. This bhava is the fruit of spiritual alignment.

description: Attainment of the Nav-Nidhis (nine treasures), representing material, mental, and spiritual abundance and divine grace.

description: Total absorption in the presence of the True Lord. This bhava brings spiritual union and complete oneness with Divine Truth.

name: Naya sangat daksh bhava
description: This bhava supports lawyers and legal practitioners in becoming wise, capable, and skillful in guiding society through the path of justice and dharma.

name: Aham swikar bhava
description: This bhava is about acknowledging when we knowingly take stress due to ego. It helps us take responsibility for our inner state and shift toward humility and awareness.

name: ‡§Æ‡§π‡§æ‡§® bhava

name: Kaam ichha mukt bhava

name: Madhuram bhava

name: Aanandit bhava

description: This bhava allows your spiritual guides to intervene and pull you out of darkness, confusion, or danger when needed‚Äîwithout needing to call them consciously.

name: Shashavat parma anand ekakar bhava

name: ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£ ‡§∞‡§∏ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§‡§ø bhava
